description: The dashboard provides insights of dependency performance of Azure Apps through Application Insights.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let minDuration = iif(isempty("$min_duration"), "0", "$min_duration");
let maxDuration = iif(isempty("$max_duration"), "0", "$max_duration");

dependencies
// additional filters can be applied here
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| extend type=iff(tolower(type) == "http (tracked component)", "HTTP", type), target=tostring(split(target, " | cid-v1")[0])
| extend ["Dependency Name"] = strcat(type, ": ", name, " ", target)
| where ("All" in ($dependency) or ["Dependency Name"] in ($dependency))
| where duration >= todouble(minDuration) and duration <= todouble(maxDuration)
// calculate average dependency duration for all dependencies
| summarize AVG = avg(duration), P95 = percentiles(duration, 95), MAX = max(duration) by bin(timestamp, $__interval)
| project timestamp, AVG = AVG/1000, P95 = P95/1000, MAX = MAX/1000
| order by timestamp asc

let minDuration = iif(isempty("$min_duration"), "0", "$min_duration");
let maxDuration = iif(isempty("$max_duration"), "0", "$max_duration");

dependencies
// additional filters can be applied here
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| extend type=iff(tolower(type) == "http (tracked component)", "HTTP", type), target=tostring(split(target, " | cid-v1")[0])
| extend ["Dependency Name"] = strcat(type, ": ", name, " ", target)
| where ("All" in ($dependency) or ["Dependency Name"] in ($dependency))
| where duration >= todouble(minDuration) and duration <= todouble(maxDuration)
// calculate average request duration for all requests
| extend ResponseTime = duration/1000
| project timestamp, ResponseTime
| order by timestamp asc

panels.title: Distribution of Server Dependency Response Time (ms)

let minDuration = iif(isempty("$min_duration"), "0", "$min_duration");
let maxDuration = iif(isempty("$max_duration"), "0", "$max_duration");

dependencies
// additional filters can be applied here
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| extend type=iff(tolower(type) == "http (tracked component)", "HTTP", type), target=tostring(split(target, " | cid-v1")[0])
| extend ["Dependency Name"] = strcat(type, ": ", name, " ", target)
| where ("All" in ($dependency) or ["Dependency Name"] in ($dependency))

| order by timestamp asc

panels.title: Count of Requests by Server Response Time (sec)

panels.title: Dependency count by Duration (ms)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let minDuration = iif(isempty("$min_duration"), "0", "$min_duration");
let maxDuration = iif(isempty("$max_duration"), "0", "$max_duration");

dependencies
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
// additional filters can be applied here
| extend type=iff(tolower(type) == "http (tracked component)", "HTTP", type), target=tostring(split(target, " | cid-v1")[0])
| extend ["Dependency Name"] = strcat(type, ": ", name, " ", target)
| where ("All" in ($dependency) or ["Dependency Name"] in ($dependency))
| where duration >= todouble(minDuration) and duration <= todouble(maxDuration)
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| count

let minDuration = iif(isempty("$min_duration"), "0", "$min_duration");
let maxDuration = iif(isempty("$max_duration"), "0", "$max_duration");

dependencies
// additional filters can be applied here
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| extend type=iff(tolower(type) == "http (tracked component)", "HTTP", type), target=tostring(split(target, " | cid-v1")[0])
| extend ["Dependency Name"] = strcat(type, ": ", name, " ", target)
| where ("All" in ($dependency) or ["Dependency Name"] in ($dependency))
| where duration >= todouble(minDuration) and duration <= todouble(maxDuration)
| where success == false
| count

panels.description: Click on a dependency name to filter dashboard.

azureLogAnalytics.query:
set truncationmaxrecords=10000;set truncationmaxsize=67108864; 
let m = dependencies
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where client_Type != "Browser"  
| project itemCount, duration, typeTransform=iff(tolower(type) == "http (tracked component)", "HTTP", type), targetTransform=tostring(split(target, " | cid-v1")[0]), name, type, target;
m
| summarize Count=sum(itemCount), Avg=sum(itemCount * duration) / sum(itemCount)
| project ["Dependency name"]="All", Avg, Count
| union(
m
| summarize Count=sum(itemCount), Avg=sum(itemCount * duration) / sum(itemCount) by typeTransform=iff(tolower(type) == "http (tracked component)", "HTTP", type), targetTransform=tostring(split(target, " | cid-v1")[0]), name, target, type
| sort by Avg desc
| project ["Dependency name"]=strcat(typeTransform, ": ", name , " ", targetTransform), Avg, Count, type, target, name)

panels.title: Top Dependencies by Avg Duration

panels.description: Click on the OperationID or dependency name to open the trace details in explorer
panels.title: Top 20 Dependencies matching $dependency by Relevance

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| extend type=iff(tolower(type) == "http (tracked component)", "HTTP", type), target=tostring(split(target, " | cid-v1")[0])
| project ["Dependency Name"] = strcat(type, ": ", name, " ", target)
| summarize count() by ["Dependency Name"]

dependencies
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| extend type=iff(tolower(type) == "http (tracked component)", "HTTP", type), target=tostring(split(target, " | cid-v1")[0])
| project ["Dependency Name"] = strcat(type, ": ", name, " ", target), duration
| where ("All" in ($dependency) or ["Dependency Name"] in ($dependency))
| top 1 by duration asc
| project tostring(duration)

dependencies
| where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
| where client_Type != "Browser"
| extend type=iff(tolower(type) == "http (tracked component)", "HTTP", type), target=tostring(split(target, " | cid-v1")[0])
| project ["Dependency Name"] = strcat(type, ": ", name, " ", target), duration
| where ("All" in ($dependency) or ["Dependency Name"] in ($dependency))
| top 1 by duration desc
| project tostring(duration)

title: Azure / Insights / Applications - Performance - 2. Dependencies
